classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B2, C1, C2, C3, C4, C1-C5 elective, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, and F. C4, D5, and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C3, C4, D1, D3, D4, D5, or F.
Any free elective can go here. Total 28 Free Elective units required for the major. CHEM124/CHEM125 recommended.

Select at least one of the following: PHYS323, PHYS340, PHYS341, PHYS357, PHYS417, PHYS422, PHYS423, PHYS452, ASTR444. Up to 4 units may be chosen from the following: HIST350, PHIL321, PHIL421, SCM451. Total combined elective credit in PHYS400, PHYS404; ASTR400, ASTR404; GEOL400, GEOL404 limited to 8 units, with a maximum of 2 units per quarter.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B2, C1, C2, C3, C4, C1-C5 elective, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, and F. C4, D5, and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C3, C4, D1, D3, D4, D5, or F.

Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Any GWR class or GWR exam can go here. Refer to current catalog for prerequisites.

HIST350; PHIL321, PHIL341; SCM451 recommended. PHIL321 will meet the GE C4 requirement; HIST350 will meet the D5 requirement. If one of these is selected, increase your total free electives by 4 units.
